body: So I've soon on peoples profiles that they got friends, and I couldn't find a button to request people. So adrianosborne told me they are working/developing it. Is there any date that this friend system will be back? I would really like to know tho I can't msg people 'n stuff in-game.
body_tagged: So I've soon on peoples profiles that they got friends, and I couldn't find a button to request people. So adrianosborne told me they are working/developing it. Is there any date that this friend system will be back? I would really like to know tho I can't msg people 'n stuff in-game.
title: Friends requests?

replies.body: It might take a while because the developer of the server (IvyCode) is currently busy with his high school work. Once he gets more time he can get that on.
replies.body_tagged: It might take a while because the developer of the server (IvyCode) is currently busy with his high school work. Once he gets more time he can get that on.

replies.body: You could go onto the old site (www.old.avicus.net) and friend request them there.. THen they'd have to accept from there too... But yes, it should be back soon, I hope, however I haven't heard anything regarding it lately.
